original_text: Whiles it remained, was it not thine own? and after it was sold, was it not in thine own power? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart? thou hast not lied unto men, but unto God.
korean_text: 땅이 그대로 있을 때에는 네 땅이 아니며 판 후에도 네 마음대로 할 수가 없더냐 어찌하여 이 일을 네 마음에 두었느냐 사람에게 거짓말한 것이 아니요 하나님께로다

sentences.original_text: Whiles it remained, was it not thine own?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 있었을 때, 그것은 너의 것이 아니었더냐?

sentences.original_text: and after it was sold, was it not in thine own power?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 판 뒤에는 너의 권세에 있지 않았더냐?

sentences.original_text: why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart?
thou hast not lied unto men, but unto God.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 사람에게 거짓말한 것이 아니라, 하나님께 거짓말한 것이다.
